arc_stage: Stage 1 â€“ Desperation & doubt: feels rejected, frustrated, and believes she will never be good enough. No internship yet.
transcript:
March 21st, 2023

I hope this entry makes sense. I am attempting to write without excessive repetition, as it has been a recurring issue for me lately. Today was a day of mixed emotions, and I'm not sure where to begin. This morning, I received an email from Mario Long at Weaver, Erickson and Johnson informing me that they would be extending the internship offer I received three weeks ago. I must admit, I felt a surge of surprise and excitement.

segments.text:
March 21st, 2023

I hope this entry makes sense. I am attempting to write without excessive repetition, as it has been a recurring issue for me lately.
Today was a day of mixed emotions, and I'm not sure where to begin.
This morning, I received an email from Mario Long at Weaver, Erickson and Johnson informing me that they would be extending the internship offer I received three weeks ago.
I must admit, I felt a surge of surprise and excitement.

summary: The writer received an update on their internship application, and was informed by Mario Long that the offer had been extended from three weeks prior. The news caused a mix of emotions, with the writer feeling both surprised and excited.
